00020 #include <sstream>
00021 #include "binaryreader.h"
00022 #include "assert.h"
00023 
00024 namespace RDK2 { namespace Serialization { namespace Binary {
00025             
00026     void BinaryReader::throwIt(std::string error) throw (ReadingException) {
00027         if(BINARY_READER_ABORT_ON_EXCEPTION) {
00028             cerr << error<< endl << printStackTrace() << endl;
00029             assert(false);
00030         } else
00031             throw ReadingException(error+'\n'+printStackTrace());   
00032     }
00033     
00034     std::string BinaryReader::printStackTrace() {
00035         ostringstream oss;
00036         oss << "Stack size: " << stack.size() << endl;
00037         for (int i=0;i<(int)stack.size();i++) {
00038             oss << "\t " << i << ". " << stack[i].describe() << std::endl;  
00039         }
00040         return oss.str();
00041     }
00042     
00043     std::string BinaryReader::Context::describe() {
00044         ostringstream os;
00045         switch(state) {
00046             case(ReadingBuffer): {
00047                 os << " ReadingBuffer ";
00048             } break;
00049             case(ReadingName): {
00050                 os << " Reading named object: " << name_readName;
00051             } break;
00052             case(ReadingObject): {
00053                 os << " Reading an object, className: " << ro_className;
00054             } break;
00055             default: 
00056                 os << " Unknown state (!) ";
00057         }
00058         
00059         os << " segment of length " << length << " ("<<index<<" cnsmd) at address "<<baseoffset;
00060         return os.str();;
00061     }

00063     }}} // end namespace
